name: Coastal Rescue Simulator
description:
Coastal Rescue Simulator    
It is a third-person view as well as a first-person view simulator. The simulator has the simple goal of saving as many people as possible. In which you are a pilot of Mi-8 helicopter and the location of needy people are pointed on the compass with a yellow marker. 

Control 
WASD = Forward,Left,Backward,Right
Left Shift = UP
Left Ctrl = Down
Q   =   Left turn
E   =   Right  turn
V =    Change Camera View 
Left Mouse button = Lower the rope
